entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
